NGCHM R package

NGCHM is an R package for creating Next-Generation Clustered Heat Maps (NG-CHMs). NG-CHMs allow for dynamic exploration of heat map data in a web browser.

To learn how to create an NG-CHM using this R package, click Getting Started.

For more information on NG-CHMs, please see the NG-CHM Home Page.
